data.name: Commercial Overdraft
data.description: Easy access to approved finance to manage everyday business expenses.

features.additionalInfo: Approved limit: A transaction account with an approved limit and 24/7 access to available funds.
Flexible repayment options: No set repayments
24/7 access: You can access your commercial overdraft using a Business Visa Debit Card, Internet and Phone banking or in branch.
Security : Cash, property or business assets may be offered as security
Fixed rates are not available on a Commercial Overdraft. Talk to your banker today for more information on applicable interest rate.
Interest is calculated daily on the balance owing, and charged monthly. A margin may apply depending on the type of security provided.
Subject to terms and conditions, this product has EXTRA_REPAYMENTS option available.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.
With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Your business must be registered in Australia

A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property

fees.name: Renegotiation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies whenever we agree to renegotiate or vary the terms or conditions of the facility

fees.name: Loan Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we agree to discharge a security linked to the facility
